Install matplotlib¶

python -m pip install -U pip python -m pip install -U matplotlib

Run tests like this¶

Ubuntu (med Python 3.6):¶

Run a specific test file:¶

markus-laptop:~/lesim/lesim2$ python -m unittest -v tests/test_beta.py

Run all test files¶

markus-laptop:~/lesim/lesim2$ python -m unittest -v tests/test_*.py

Windows (med Python 3.8):¶

Run a specific test file:¶

C:Usersmarkjlesim>C:Python38python.exe -m unittest -v tests/test_beta.py

Run all test files (that starts with “test_”)¶

Make sure there is an empty file __init__.py in the test folder C:Usersmarkjlesim> C:Python38python.exe -m unittest
